mapper.insert: insert into t_exception_log (uid, status, create_time, update_time, ip, ip_source, method, operation, is_del, exception_json, exception_message, params) values (#{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{exceptionJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{exceptionMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
